tweet: Hey it's great to be on twitter.  Hope to share information on Green Power Sources and technologies with others.
EPA report released today says that several contaminated sites in the US are good for wind farms.  Be interesting to see new business plans.
Just read a report that Apple has filed a patent on a solar powered device...potential an iPhone or iPod.
I read an interesting story today on offshore winds.  They are very fast, but due to cost, we can't develop them as cheaply.
Lots of research going into turbine blades these days.  Looks like some are going back to a 2 blade platform.
